function.name: GetRCBool
function.description: Gets a Boolean value from the configuration database.

parameter.name: pszKeyName
parameter.description: Name of the key to retrieve.

parameter.name: fValue
parameter.description: Value to return if the key is found in the configuration database. If the key cannot be found, GetRCBool returns the logical complement of this value.

return.description: If the key is found in the configuration database, the return value is the value of the fValue parameter. If the key cannot be found, the return value is the logical complement of the fValue parameter.
